reviews.title: Great Secure Place To Work
reviews.text: Great company to work for. The hardest thing you’ll ever have to do here is wait for someone to leave the company so you can advance. Haha! I loved it here. Worked for them for 3 years

reviews.title: Summer Intern
reviews.text: Awesome company to work for! Love who I am working with and always ready to learn more. Wish the summer can be longer so this experience won't end soon:/

reviews.title: Great place to work, benefits, snacks & drinks for the employees
reviews.text: Was laid off during the pandemic, would love to get back again. The managers is  encouraging you to improve and give you steps and training to improve open door process. Coaching to help ypu
reviews.pros: Great perks, managers and time off. Snacks and she needs provided for the employees while we’re working

reviews.title: Good: Entry level sales. Bad: Not good for a senior seller
reviews.text: Selling only a catagory like travel can be very challenging. This was pre pandemic. I cant imagine what it is like during covid. Sr management sent emails frequently late at night and expected you to respond.
reviews.cons: Late night messages and emailsvfrom management

reviews.title: Sales Development Rep
reviews.text: The sales department in NYC were hired from Singleplatform, a company Tripadvisor acquired last April. The transition was rough with COVID but overall, TA puts a lot of emphasis on diversity, culture, support. The people in the sales department are great. Base salary starting out is lower than industry standard but with commission it averages out to the same.  It's not for everyone. If you're not a hard worker, you won't make it. You will learn a lot though.
reviews.cons: High paced, you have to be constantly working

reviews.title: Horrible pay, horrible company
reviews.text:
Work-life balance
Work-life balance at Tripadvisor is non existent

Pay & benefits
My pay and benefits at Tripadvisor are  very limited

Job security and advancement
In terms of job security at Tripadvisor, I think there is none

Management
In general, managers at Tripadvisor are awful

Culture
Collaboration with my colleagues at Tripadvisor is everyone was miserable

Overall
My experience working at Tripadvisor  the worst work experience I've ever gone through

reviews.title: Great place to work
reviews.text: From the professionalism to the perks, TripAdvisor is a great place to work for. Employees are treated with respect and there is definitely work and life balance.

reviews.title: Great people, perfect work life balance.
reviews.text: It is possible to start late, leave late. Family first and every each one of managers fully acknowledge that and support that as long as you do your work in a timely manner. Working with talented people is encouraging and any body especially new hires can fell safe.

reviews.title: Awesome employer
reviews.text: Tripadvisor is an amazing company to work for with a big drive in teamwork and never stop learning. The company supports anyone who wants to develop within the company.

reviews.title: Awesome work culture and great on benefits
reviews.text: I've had the privilege to work with some of the brightest minds and the company takes care of their employees pretty well, several remote locations to work out of and flexible work times are the best.

reviews.title: Do not recommend
reviews.text: Company is not what it used to be- bad decisions lead to many job cuts recently. Bad reputation amongst clients/partners. No career growth and bad management

reviews.title: Fun place to work, not consistent
reviews.text: Executive decisions affect day to day work negatively. They are unaware of their lower level employees job responsibilities. Need a clearer definition of what their goal is.

reviews.title: Great culture, interesting work
reviews.text: There is never a dull moment at Tripadvisor. Things move fast, which I love; but appreciate this is not for everyone. The people are what make the company, and it is the reason I love my job.

reviews.title: Love working at TA
reviews.text: A wonderful place to work for, and wonderful work environment. Endless list of benefits, and a real meritocracy. Office is lovely, and there are always events on a monthly basis to keep employees engaged.

reviews.title: Good company
reviews.text: Good company, good management. They pay fairly but operations are a bit slow. Nice work culture and staff is very friendly. Overall a good company to work with.

reviews.title: Die besten Kollegen auf der Welt
reviews.text:
Tolle Benefits. Arbeit ist monoton und das Management hat wenig Ahnung vom Tagesgeschäft.
Nur fixiert auf die Quartalszahlen und MRR.

reviews.title: Collaborative workplace
reviews.text:
Collaborative workplace with lots of incentives, multicultural environment.
Chance to plan the day according to your priorities, doing a minimum of number of calls or call-time per day.

reviews.title: Great place to work
reviews.text: Great team, great management, free drinks, breakfast and nibbles, subsidised restaurant, relaxed atmosphere, but you definitely have to know your onions, no flakery or fakery tolerated. Very diverse team from all over the world. Fantastic

reviews.title: Very competitive and stressful job
reviews.text:
Great experience in a very competitive work place, I have worked with over 100 people from all over the EU.
Interesting if you wish to challenge yourself in a busy and stressful environment.

reviews.title: Productive and Amazing workplace!
reviews.text: Very nice staff and offices. Varied and busy work. Data handling and processing. On site amenities and food. 10/10 Job. and I would happily work there again!
